article.author: Princess Cruises
article.title: Dream with Us | Princess Cruises
article.lead: Princess is using this pause of guest vacations to consult with the best minds in medical science, public health, and infectious disease control. When it’s safe to sail again, they’ll be ready with new health & safety protocols that will give their guests and crew peace of mind. Until then, where are you dreaming of taking your next vacation?
